item.title: 15 Hololive Events to Check Out Around Expo & Fes 2026(Overview)
item.author: Linsaloty
item.content:encoded:
Sorry for the long video! Feel free to use the timestamps to skip around to whatever interest you! I added a bonus event that I meant to put but forgot in the pinned comment!
Find me on X: https://twitter.com/linsaloty BGM: "Shower" by https://www.youtube.com/@KyattoWorks ãƒ»Hololive goods and haul playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZA05Mx0fct4reBt9faUqqR1gBYMpPk4l ãƒ»Hololive event overview playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZA05Mx0fct747dYypRmQIIfyGFXxB3yg ãƒ»Hololive event/collab vlog playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZA05Mx0fct5KQkT5pLgMt7m4rtRiKcLl
